Digital Marketing & Strategy | INFUZ - A Digital Agency
Digital Marketing & Strategy | INFUZ - A Digital Agency
Yesterday's News - Digital and Social Marketing | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Yesterday's News Bag Builder

Customers were asked to use their creativity to design the season’s new "it" handbag with the Bag Builder tool. This Flash application used art from the new packaging and other paper textures inspired by the new brand look.

ContentPage.Title: Contegix - Digital Marketing and Search Strategy | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Contegix Website and Branding

With the launch of Contegix.com, Infuz developed the new brand positioning and aesthetic for this top-tier technology and cloud hosting provider. Infuz also developed a set of brand guidelines that included service iconography and a logo redesign.

ContentPage.Title: Tidy Cats - Digital Marketing Strategy | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Tidy Cats Interactive Home Tour

The interactive home tour showcased different tips and tricks to help create a welcoming home for family and guests. Visitors could explore many different rooms of a home and read from five categories of tips. The content was driven by a CMS to highlight new tips each week.

ContentPage.Title: Intelispend - Digital, Social Media, Content & Search Marketing | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Intelispend.com

Infuz designed and launched the InteliSpend.com site to reflect the company’s new brand. We designed a custom set of icons and art to reflect the friendly and accessible nature of the organization. As one of the premier pre-paid technology solution providers in the world, InteliSpend also needed a robust CMS to manage the product offerings and drive new sales.

ContentPage.Title: Energizer - Digital & Social Media Marketing Strategy | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Energizer & VH1 Save The Music

Infuz designed and developed a central component of Energizer’s communication and engagement strategy that inlcuded a VH1 partnership promotion.

ContentPage.Title: Prime 1000 - Digital Marketing Strategy | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Prime 1000 Brand Identity

Infuz crafted a new logo and tagline for Prime 1000, one St. Louis’ top steakhouses, located in the heart of downtown’s loft district.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Engagement - Twitter | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
The State of Twitter Report

A sample graphic from the State of Twitter STL 2011 Report highlighting the most popular types of links being shared in St. Louis. The report was assembled using the STL Tweets platform, allowing us to view our city from a unique perspective by collecting data about what St. Louis is sharing and discussing on Twitter.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Engagement - St. Louis Cardinals | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
St. Louis Cardinals Twitter Infographic

Infuz captured the story of the St. Louis Cardinals and their amazing 2011 baseball season through the conversations of fans on Twitter. From trending topics to milestones in the season, we visually wanted to pay homage to the greatest fans in baseball and show that data can tell a great tale.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Engagement - Twitter | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
STL Index Website

STL Index is a data-centric approach to measuring online influence in St. Louis. It’s the first tool for St. Louisans and others to learn about their Twitter influence within the Metro Area.

ContentPage.Title: Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
The Tidy Cats Online Community

The Tidy Cats Online Community features games and content that keep their consumers active and participating.

ContentPage.Title: Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
The Tidy Cats Online Community

We created Purrfect Pic, the ultimate "hot or not" for cats contains over 20,000 user generated photos.

ContentPage.Title: Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
The Tidy Cats Online Community

We created the Flash game Catnap Climb which has an average play time of 2.74 minutes.

ContentPage.Title: Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Tidy Cats Facebook Page

After establishing the brand's official Facebook page we attracted nearly 150,000 page "likes". That's 1000 per day.

ContentPage.Title: Consumer Engagement & Social Media Strategy - Tidy Cats | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
Tidy Cats Litter Selector

The Tidy Cats Litter Selector allows users to answer a few simple questions about their lifestyle and cats' litter environment to help them choose the proper litter solution.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
ContentPage.InfoText:
Charter Business

Our redesign process included usability studies along with current and potential customer feedback to help inform the new website architecture.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
ContentPage.InfoText:
Charter Business

User feedback helped us determine important information and how and where to feature it throughout the site.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
ContentPage.InfoText:
Charter Business

Our research helped us determine not only how customers identify themselves, but also how they shop for services.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
ContentPage.InfoText:
Charter Business

We developed the Bundle Builder, a user-centered shopping cart system that integrated with Charter Business back-end database.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy & SEO - Charter Business
ContentPage.InfoText:
Charter Business

Flexible enough to accommodate multiple products, restrictions and revolving promotional offers, the Bundle Builder was then user tested and validated significant improvements in cart completion.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Integration & Fundraising - NCCS | INFUZ
Social Media Integration & Fundraising - NCCS | INFUZ
Social Media Integration & Fundraising - NCCS | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
National Children’s Cancer Society

We gave visitors a variety of tools to help engage with the NCCS. From volunteer opportunities to establishing a mobile donation program, people could contribute through multiple ways.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Integration & Fundraising - NCCS | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
National Children’s Cancer Society

The donation scoreboard featured donations based on the state of the donor. Donation totals from Team East and West were aggregated in real time.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Integration & Fundraising - NCCS | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
National Children’s Cancer Society

For new visitors and fans learning more about the NCCS, we showcased different programs and efforts running concurrently with the campaign.

ContentPage.Title: Social Media Integration & Fundraising - NCCS | INFUZ
ContentPage.InfoText:
National Children’s Cancer Society

The stories of the children were compelling content that we needed to tell. The featured “Players” gallery featured a wide range of ages and narratives that illustrated the great work the NCCS does.

ContentPage.InfoText:
helpingpeople.org

We helped United Way of Greater St. Louis share personal, real-life stories of community members that have overcome challenges with their help.

ContentPage.Meta: United Way of Greater St. Louis
ContentPage.InfoText:
helpingpeople.org

We helped United Way of Greater St. Louis share personal, real-life stories of community members that have overcome challenges with their help.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy - United Way | INFUZ
ContentPage.Meta: United Way of Greater St. Louis
ContentPage.InfoText:
helpingpeople.org

The donation calculator allows users to preview real-life examples of how donations add up and what they actually go towards.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy - United Way | INFUZ
ContentPage.Meta: United Way of Greater St. Louis
ContentPage.InfoText:
helpingpeople.org

The community map shows not only how many people were helped within a particular county, but also the number of agencies across the area that provided support.

ContentPage.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy - United Way | INFUZ
ContentPage.Meta: United Way of Greater St. Louis
ContentPage.InfoText:
helpingpeople.org

The website not only provided real-life examples, but allowed users to get more information about donating and volunteering with United Way of Greater St. Louis.

ContentPage.InfoText:
LouFest Twitter Scavenger Hunt

Our live tweet wall displayed real time tweets from the event that concert-goers could interact with.

ContentPage.InfoText:
LouFest Twitter Scavenger Hunt

Scavenger hunt winners were awarded a vintage upcycled t-shirt that was screen printed with I # STL.

ContentPage.InfoText:
LouFest Twitter Scavenger Hunt

Built on our STLtweets.com engine, loufesttweets.com aggregated tweets about the event.

ContentPage.InfoText:
LouFest Twitter Scavenger Hunt

Scavenger hunt photos were also displayed on the large screens near the stage.
